channel.title: God, from a gamer's point of view
channel.description:
I thought it up as a gamer's view of God and life, but decided to post it after I skimmed through Mopar's post named 'God, from a programmer's point of view.' found at http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,27948.0.html .
So, here is what a gamer may think of God/life.
-We could all be a video game. -You know de ja vu? It's just lag. -God has one suck ass connection, seeing as it took Jesus 3 days to respawn.

item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:5, topic:26265”]free cheats please

would be better if we could spawn. Maybe if we give god blowjobs he’ll give us free stoof?[/quote]did that tactic work you you in runescape?

ontopic: unless there were hacks/not many noobs, i dont think i would play this thing called ‘life’
